overview: Who knows the deepest, sexiest secrets that beat in the hearts of the Penthouse Pets? Penthouse Video does, and we've got the film to prove it! Join the gorgeous girls of Penthouse at a seductive dinner party as they act out their most revealing fantasies. From a steamy kitchen session to a cyberspace fantasy and everywhere in between, there is no limit to their erotic desires. These confessions are quaranteed to leave you spellbound!
title: Penthouse: Confessions
